page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF THE AREA
page.content: Mainly{farmland;}mature, long_established farms. {Belbroughton}village consists of mainly older cottages. {Barratts,}the builders, have just finished an estate of starter and retirement homes. {Population}_mainly older people who are or soon will be retired. There are few{amenities}in the area. For major{shopping}or{leisure pursuits, the residents have to travel to{Stourbridge}or{Bromsgrove. {Property }in the area is sold at a premium as it is an area convenient to {Birmingham. The{landscape}is mainly hilly with many trees, both coniferous and deciduous.
